document_data.mainbody: he Street of the Dragon was a main thoroughfare in Daerlun, Sembia, circa the Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR. This street ran east-west from the Sunset Gate (the western gate out of the city to the Way of the Manticore), through the Westmarket area, and on to the Place of Banners, a large open area in the center of the city that contained the seat of local government, Bergun Hall. On the north side of the street, not far from the Sunset gate was the luxurious Black Banner Inn.
